effect.sun_moon: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user’s Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user’s Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user’s Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.

short_effect.sun_moon: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user’s Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.
